sqlMap.select: /* ManualItemDAO.selectListForManualTree */ SELECT A.MANUAL_ID ,A.ORDINAL ,A.ITEM_ID ,B.ITEM_ID ,B.ITEM_NM ,B.FLD_ID ,C.FLD_NM FROM WP2_MANUAL_ITEM A JOIN WP2_ITEM_MSTR B ON A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' JOIN WP2_TYPE_ITEM_MSTR C ON B.FLD_ID = C.FLD_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.MANUAL_ID = #MANUAL_ID# ORDER BY A.ORDINAL
sqlMap.delete: /* ManualItemDAO.deleteByManualId */ DELETE FROM WP2_MANUAL_ITEM WHERE 1=1 AND MANUAL_ID = #MANUAL_ID#
